name: Space Miner (mattj375)
description:
A simple asteroids style clone. Features a few levels and a simple story. Control via mouse+WASD or arrow keys; fire with mouse or space.

This was the first project I was involved with for Protege Game Studio, where we teach students coding/art/design by building games.

(Cheat codes: 'L'=extra life, 'N'=instantly destroy all normal enemies)
